title: Bane takes down KD and Kyrie in Memphis
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss Desmond Bane and the Grizzlies big win over the Brooklyn Nets. The vaccine mandate has been lifted in NYC, what does this mean for Kyrie and the Eastern Conference? It’s too hot for the Heat in Miami, as in-fighting gets played out on court during the Warriors game. Is the number 1 seed in the East now up for grabs? And Jalen Rose is pumped for the Michigan Wolverines before their sweet 16 matchup with Villanova. Don’t miss who he brought to the studio. All that and much more.
